marker.ph: <<Window.TaskbarItemInfo> <TaskbarItemInfo ProgressState="{Binding TaskbarItemProgressState, Mode=OneWay}" ProgressValue="{Binding ProgressPrecent, Mode=OneWay}" /> </Window.TaskbarItemInfo> <DockPanel Margin="30"> <StackPanel DockPanel.Dock="Top"> <Grid Margin="5" VerticalAlignment="Center"> <Grid.ColumnDefinitions> <ColumnDefinition Width="130" /> <ColumnDefinition /> <ColumnDefinition Width="32" /> </Grid.ColumnDefinitions> <Label Grid.Column="0" HorizontalAlignment="Left" VerticalAlignment="Center">Путь к файлам:</Label> <TextBox Text="{Binding PhotoPath, Mode=TwoWay, UpdateSourceTrigger=PropertyChanged}" Grid.Column="1" IsReadOnly="{Binding ProcessStarted}" Margin="0,0,5,0" /> <Button Command="{Binding SelectPhotoPathCommand}" ToolTip="Выбрать путь, где находятся фотографии" Grid.Column="2"> <Viewbox> <Path Stretch="Fill" Data="{StaticResource folder_ellipsisStyle0}" Margin="5" Stroke="##FF2CC8C8" RenderTransformOrigin="0.455,0.455" /> </Viewbox> </Button> </Grid> <Grid Margin="5" VerticalAlignment="Center"> <Grid.ColumnDefinitions> <ColumnDefinition Width="130" /> <ColumnDefinition /> <ColumnDefinition Width="32" /> </Grid.ColumnDefinitions> <Label Grid.Column="0" HorizontalAlignment="Left" VerticalAlignment="Center">Путь к сохранению:</Label> <TextBox Text="{Binding SavePath, Mode=TwoWay, UpdateSourceTrigger=PropertyChanged}" Grid.Column="1" IsReadOnly="{Binding ProcessStarted}" Margin="0,0,5,0" /> <Button Command="{Binding SelectSavePathCommand}" ToolTip="Выбрать путь, куда фотографии перенесутся" Grid.Column="2"> <Viewbox> <Path Stretch="Fill" Data="{StaticResource folder_ellipsisStyle0}" Margin="5" Stroke="##FF2CC8C8" /> </Viewbox> </Button> </Grid> <Grid Margin="5" VerticalAlignment="Center"> <Grid.ColumnDefinitions> <ColumnDefinition Width="130" /> <ColumnDefinition /> </Grid.ColumnDefinitions> <Label Grid.Row="0" Grid.Column="0" HorizontalAlignment="Left" VerticalAlignment="Center">Расширение файла:</Label> <TextBox Text="{Binding ExtensionFilter, Mode=TwoWay, UpdateSourceTrigger=PropertyChanged}" Grid.Column="1" ToolTip="Для нескольких расширений, разделить ;" VerticalAlignment="Bottom" /> </Grid> <CheckBox Margin="5" Content="Искать в вложенных папках" IsChecked="{Binding SearchInSubFolder, Mode=TwoWay, UpdateSourceTrigger=PropertyChanged}" IsEnabled="{Binding ProcessNotStarted, Mode=OneWay}" /> <Grid Margin="5" VerticalAlignment="Center"> <Grid.ColumnDefinitions> <ColumnDefinition Width="160" /> <ColumnDefinition /> <ColumnDefinition /> </Grid.ColumnDefinitions> <Label Grid.Column="0" HorizontalAlignment="Left" VerticalAlignment="Center">Маска наименовая папки:</Label> <TextBox Text="{Binding DirMask, Mode=TwoWay, UpdateSourceTrigger=PropertyChanged}" Grid.Column="1" ToolTip="{Binding DirMaskToolTip, Source={StaticResource Resources}, Mode=OneTime}" /> <TextBlock Text="{Binding SampleDirName, Mode=OneWay}" Grid.Column="2" TextAlignment="Left" Margin="10,0,0,0" VerticalAlignment="Center" /> </Grid> <CheckBox Margin="5" Content="Перемещать файлы" IsChecked="{Binding MoveFiles, Mode=TwoWay, UpdateSourceTrigger=PropertyChanged}" IsEnabled="{Binding ProcessNotStarted, Mode=OneWay}" /> <Grid> <Grid.ColumnDefinitions> <ColumnDefinition /> <ColumnDefinition /> </Grid.ColumnDefinitions> <Button Grid.Column="0" Margin="5" Command="{Binding StartProcessingCommand}" HorizontalContentAlignment="Center"> <StackPanel Orientation="Horizontal" Margin="5,0,5,0"> <Viewbox> <Path Stretch="Fill" Data="{StaticResource playStyle0}" Margin="5" Stroke="##FF2CC8C8" /> </Viewbox> <TextBlock Text="Запуск" Margin="5,0,5,0" VerticalAlignment="Center" /> </StackPanel> </Button> <Button Grid.Column="1" Margin="5" Command="{Binding StopProcessingCommand}" HorizontalContentAlignment="Center"> <StackPanel Orientation="Horizontal" Margin="5,0,5,0"> <Viewbox> <Path Stretch="Fill" Data="{StaticResource stopStyle0}" Margin="5" Stroke="##FF2CC8C8" /> </Viewbox> <TextBlock Text="Стоп" Margin="5,0,5,0" VerticalAlignment="Center" /> </StackPanel> </Button> </Grid> <ProgressBar Value="{Binding ProgressValue, Mode=OneWay}" Height="24" Maximum="100" Minimum="0" Margin="5" /> </StackPanel> <ListBox DockPanel.Dock="Bottom" ItemsSource="{Binding ProcessedFiles, Mode=OneWay}" /> <DockPanel.Resources> <Style TargetType="Label"> <Setter Property="Foreground"> <Setter.Value> <LinearGradientBrush EndPoint="1,1" StartPoint="0,0"> <GradientStop Color="##FF97E9E9" Offset="1" /> <GradientStop Color="##FF2CC8C8" /> </LinearGradientBrush> </Setter.Value> </Setter> </Style> <Style TargetType="TextBlock"> <Setter Property="Foreground"> <Setter.Value> <LinearGradientBrush EndPoint="1,1" StartPoint="0,0"> <GradientStop Color="##FF97E9E9" Offset="1" /> <GradientStop Color="##FF2CC8C8" /> </LinearGradientBrush> </Setter.Value> </Setter> </Style> </DockPanel.Resources> </DockPanel>.../>
<<TaskbarItemInfo ProgressState="{Binding TaskbarItemProgressState, Mode=OneWay}" ProgressValue="{Binding ProgressPrecent, Mode=OneWay}" />.../>

<<StackPanel DockPanel.Dock="Top"> <Grid Margin="5" VerticalAlignment="Center"> <Grid.ColumnDefinitions> <ColumnDefinition Width="130" /> <ColumnDefinition /> <ColumnDefinition Width="32" /> </Grid.ColumnDefinitions> <Label Grid.Column="0" HorizontalAlignment="Left" VerticalAlignment="Center">Путь к файлам:</Label> <TextBox Text="{Binding PhotoPath, Mode=TwoWay, <TextBox Text="{Binding ExtensionFilter, Mode=TwoWay, UpdateSourceTrigger=PropertyChanged}" Grid.Column="1" ToolTip="Для нескольких расширений, разделить ;" VerticalAlignment="Bottom" /> </Grid> Stroke="##FF2CC8C8" /> </Viewbox> <TextBlock Text="Стоп" Margin="5,0,5,0" VerticalAlignment="Center" /> </StackPanel> </Button> </Grid> <ProgressBar Value="{Binding ProgressValue, Mode=OneWay}" <CheckBox Margin="5" Content="Искать в вложенных папках" IsChecked="{Binding SearchInSubFolder, Mode=TwoWay, UpdateSourceTrigger=PropertyChanged}" IsEnabled="{Binding ProcessNotStarted, Mode=OneWay}" /> <Grid Margin="5" VerticalAlignment="Center"> <Grid.ColumnDefinitions> <ColumnDefinition Width="160" /> <ColumnDefinition /> <ColumnDefinition /> </Grid.ColumnDefinitions> <Label Grid.Column="0" HorizontalAlignment="Left" VerticalAlignment="Center">Маска наименовая папки:</Label> <TextBox Text="{Binding DirMask, Mode=TwoWay, UpdateSourceTrigger=PropertyChanged}" Grid.Column="1" ToolTip="{Binding DirMaskToolTip, Source={StaticResource Resources}, Mode=OneTime}" /> <TextBlock Text="{Binding SampleDirName, Mode=OneWay}" Grid.Column="2" TextAlignment="Left" Margin="10,0,0,0" VerticalAlignment="Center" /> </Grid> <CheckBox Margin="5" Content="Перемещать файлы" IsChecked="{Binding MoveFiles, Mode=TwoWay, UpdateSourceTrigger=PropertyChanged}" IsEnabled="{Binding ProcessNotStarted, Mode=OneWay}" /> <Grid> <Grid.ColumnDefinitions> <ColumnDefinition /> <ColumnDefinition /> </Grid.ColumnDefinitions> <Button Grid.Column="0" Margin="5" Command="{Binding StartProcessingCommand}" HorizontalContentAlignment="Center"> <StackPanel Orientation="Horizontal" Margin="5,0,5,0"> <Viewbox> <Path Stretch="Fill" Data="{StaticResource playStyle0}" Margin="5" Stroke="##FF2CC8C8" /> </Viewbox> <TextBlock Text="Запуск" Margin="5,0,5,0" VerticalAlignment="Center" /> </StackPanel> </Button> <Button Grid.Column="1" Margin="5" Command="{Binding StopProcessingCommand}" HorizontalContentAlignment="Center"> <StackPanel Orientation="Horizontal" Margin="5,0,5,0"> <Viewbox> <Path Stretch="Fill" Data="{StaticResource stopStyle0}" Margin="5" Stroke="##FF2CC8C8" /> </Viewbox> <TextBlock Text="Стоп" Margin="5,0,5,0" VerticalAlignment="Center" /> </StackPanel> </Button> </Grid> <ProgressBar Value="{Binding ProgressValue, Mode=OneWay}" Height="24" Maximum="100" Minimum="0" Margin="5" /> </StackPanel> <ListBox DockPanel.Dock="Bottom" ItemsSource="{Binding ProcessedFiles, Mode=OneWay}" /> <DockPanel.Resources> <Style TargetType="Label"> <Setter Property="Foreground"> <Setter.Value> <LinearGradientBrush EndPoint="1,1" StartPoint="0,0"> <GradientStop Color="##FF97E9E9" Offset="1" /> <GradientStop Color="##FF2CC8C8" /> </LinearGradientBrush> </Setter.Value> </Setter> </Style> <Style TargetType="TextBlock"> <Setter Property="Foreground"> <Setter.Value> <LinearGradientBrush EndPoint="1,1" StartPoint="0,0"> <GradientStop Color="##FF97E9E9" Offset="1" /> <GradientStop Color="##FF2CC8C8" /> </LinearGradientBrush> </Setter.Value> </Setter> </Style> </DockPanel.Resources>.../>

<<Grid Margin="5" VerticalAlignment="Center"> <Grid.ColumnDefinitions> <ColumnDefinition Width="130" /> <ColumnDefinition /> <ColumnDefinition Width="32" /> </Grid.ColumnDefinitions> <Label Grid.Column="0" HorizontalAlignment="Left" VerticalAlignment="Center">Путь к файлам:</Label> <TextBox Text="{Binding PhotoPath, Mode=TwoWay, UpdateSourceTrigger=PropertyChanged}" Grid.Column="1" IsReadOnly="{Binding ProcessStarted}" Margin="0,0,5,0" /> <Button Command="{Binding SelectPhotoPathCommand}" ToolTip="Выбрать путь, где находятся фотографии" Grid.Column="2"> <Viewbox> <Path Stretch="Fill" Data="{StaticResource folder_ellipsisStyle0}" Margin="5" Stroke="##FF2CC8C8" RenderTransformOrigin="0.455,0.455" /> </Viewbox> </Button> </Grid> <Grid Margin="5" VerticalAlignment="Center"> <Grid.ColumnDefinitions> <ColumnDefinition Width="130" /> <ColumnDefinition /> <ColumnDefinition Width="32" /> </Grid.ColumnDefinitions> <Label Grid.Column="0" HorizontalAlignment="Left" VerticalAlignment="Center">Путь к сохранению:</Label> <TextBox Text="{Binding SavePath, Mode=TwoWay, UpdateSourceTrigger=PropertyChanged}" Grid.Column="1" IsReadOnly="{Binding ProcessStarted}" Margin="0,0,5,0" /> <Button Command="{Binding SelectSavePathCommand}" ToolTip="Выбрать путь, куда фотографии перенесутся" Grid.Column="2"> <Viewbox> <Path Stretch="Fill" Data="{StaticResource folder_ellipsisStyle0}" Margin="5" Stroke="##FF2CC8C8" /> </Viewbox> </Button> </Grid> <Grid Margin="5" VerticalAlignment="Center"> <Grid.ColumnDefinitions> <ColumnDefinition Width="130" /> <ColumnDefinition /> </Grid.ColumnDefinitions> <Label Grid.Row="0" Grid.Column="0" HorizontalAlignment="Left" VerticalAlignment="Center">Расширение файла:</Label> <TextBox Text="{Binding ExtensionFilter, Mode=TwoWay, UpdateSourceTrigger=PropertyChanged}" Grid.Column="1" ToolTip="Для нескольких расширений, разделить ;" VerticalAlignment="Bottom" /> </Grid> <CheckBox Margin="5" Content="Искать в вложенных папках" IsChecked="{Binding SearchInSubFolder, Mode=TwoWay, UpdateSourceTrigger=PropertyChanged}" IsEnabled="{Binding ProcessNotStarted, Mode=OneWay}" /> <Grid Margin="5" VerticalAlignment="Center"> <Grid.ColumnDefinitions> <ColumnDefinition Width="160" /> <ColumnDefinition /> <ColumnDefinition /> </Grid.ColumnDefinitions> <Label Grid.Column="0" HorizontalAlignment="Left" VerticalAlignment="Center">Маска наименовая папки:</Label> <TextBox Text="{Binding DirMask, Mode=TwoWay, UpdateSourceTrigger=PropertyChanged}" Grid.Column="1" ToolTip="{Binding DirMaskToolTip, Source={StaticResource Resources}, Mode=OneTime}" /> <TextBlock Text="{Binding SampleDirName, Mode=OneWay}" Grid.Column="2" TextAlignment="Left" Margin="10,0,0,0" VerticalAlignment="Center" /> </Grid> <CheckBox Margin="5" Content="Перемещать файлы" IsChecked="{Binding MoveFiles, Mode=TwoWay, UpdateSourceTrigger=PropertyChanged}" IsEnabled="{Binding ProcessNotStarted, Mode=OneWay}" /> <Grid> <Grid.ColumnDefinitions> <ColumnDefinition /> <ColumnDefinition /> </Grid.ColumnDefinitions> <Button Grid.Column="0" Margin="5" Command="{Binding StartProcessingCommand}" HorizontalContentAlignment="Center"> <StackPanel Orientation="Horizontal" Margin="5,0,5,0"> <Viewbox> <Path Stretch="Fill" Data="{StaticResource playStyle0}" Margin="5" Stroke="##FF2CC8C8" /> </Viewbox> <TextBlock Text="Запуск" Margin="5,0,5,0" VerticalAlignment="Center" /> </StackPanel> </Button> <Button Grid.Column="1" Margin="5" Command="{Binding StopProcessingCommand}" HorizontalContentAlignment="Center"> <StackPanel Orientation="Horizontal" Margin="5,0,5,0"> <Viewbox> <Path Stretch="Fill" Data="{StaticResource stopStyle0}" Margin="5" Stroke="##FF2CC8C8" /> </Viewbox> <TextBlock Text="Стоп" Margin="5,0,5,0" VerticalAlignment="Center" /> </StackPanel> </Button> </Grid> <ProgressBar Value="{Binding ProgressValue, Mode=OneWay}" Height="24" Maximum="100" Minimum="0" Margin="5" />.../>
